DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and preliminary efficacy of two formulations of the Latanoprost-PPDS in subjects with ocular hypertension or open-angle glaucoma.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Different Formulations of the L-PPDS in Subjects With OH or OAG
DOC.criteria: Subjects over 18 years of age diagnosed with ocular hypertension or openangle glaucoma Subjects who have a best corrected visual acuity of 20/100 or better Subjects who wear contact lenses Subjects who have uncontrolled medical conditions Subjects requiring chronic topical artificial tears, lubricants, and/or requiring any other chronic ocular topical medications Subjects who have a history of chronic or recurrent inflammatory eye disease
